name: This War of Mine: The Board Game – Second Edition
description:
This cooperative experience of This War of Mine immerses players into the harrowing lives of civilians trapped in a war-torn city, facing relentless challenges that test the limits of human resilience. They must navigate a series of morally complex decisions, manage scarce resources, and confront the stark realities of survival in a besieged environment. The Book of Scripts provides a rich narrative layer, making each playthrough different and adding to the game's replayability with a wide range of events and encounters.

The Second Edition elevates the experience with improved miniatures, double-layered character boards, and a complete rulebook. It also includes the story-rich Tales from the Ruined City and Days of the Siege, along with a new expansion introducing another set of heart-wrenching stories of survival woven into scenarios with a more dynamic, shortened playtime. With refined gameplay mechanics, these enhancements offer both new and returning players the most immersive and polished version of the game.

—description from the publisher
